alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 15 at 1:50PM MST until January 15 at 2:15PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... North central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 215 PM MST. * At 146 PM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Pinon, or 16 miles northwest of Pueblo Airport, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This snow squall will affect I-25 in northern Pueblo county and Southern El Paso county. Locations impacted include... Fountain and Pinon. If this snow squall holds together, it will affect northern Pueblo. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...OBSERVED
